skuid__text.contents: It looks like you haven't created an app yet.
Create one to start developing with Skuid, or install one of our sample apps to see what's possible.

This action deletes URLs{{#$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.nativeEnabled}}, mobile packages, {{/$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.nativeEnabled}} and {{^$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}profile permissions{{/$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}{{#$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}}site permissions{{/$Model.FeatureFlags.data.0.appPermSetsEnabled}} associated with this app.

It does not delete Skuid Pages used in the app.
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this app? You can't undo this.
